issues.title: Implement real-time collaboration features
issues.description:
Add real-time collaborative editing capabilities to improve team productivity.

## Release Note

Introduced real-time collaboration features allowing multiple users to edit documents simultaneously. Changes are synchronized instantly across all connected clients with conflict resolution.

issues.title: Fix race condition in data synchronization
issues.description:
Concurrent operations were causing data inconsistencies in multi-user scenarios.

## Release Note

Resolved a race condition in data synchronization that could cause inconsistencies when multiple users modified the same data simultaneously. Data integrity is now properly maintained.

issues.title: Add advanced search with filters
issues.description:
Implement comprehensive search functionality with multiple filter options.

## Release Note

Added advanced search capabilities with filtering options including:
- Date ranges
- Content types
- User assignments
- Status filters
- Custom tags

Search results are now more precise and easier to navigate.

issues.title: Migrate to new database schema
issues.description:
Database schema migration to improve performance and support new features.

## Release Note

Completed migration to an optimized database schema that provides:
- 40% faster query performance
- Better support for concurrent operations
- Improved data relationships

**Note:** This migration was performed automatically during the update process.

issues.title: Remove deprecated configuration options
issues.description:
Clean up deprecated configuration options that were marked for removal.

## Release Note

Removed the following deprecated configuration options:
- `legacy_mode` (use `compatibility.legacy_support` instead)
- `old_api_format` (use `api.response_format` instead)
- `deprecated_auth` (OAuth2 is now required)

Please update your configuration files accordingly.

issues.title: Add experimental AI-powered suggestions
issues.description:
Introduce AI-powered content suggestions as an experimental feature.

## Release Note

Introduced experimental AI-powered content suggestions to help users create better content. This feature:
- Suggests improvements to writing
- Recommends relevant tags
- Provides content structure guidance

**Note:** This is an experimental feature and may change in future releases.

issues.title: Security patch for authentication bypass
issues.description:
Critical security fix for potential authentication bypass vulnerability.

## Release Note

Fixed a critical security vulnerability that could potentially allow authentication bypass under specific conditions. All users are strongly encouraged to update immediately.
